mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.fangwu_order_uuid_number as fangwuOrderUuidNumber ,a.fangwu_id as fangwuId ,a.zuke_id as zukeId ,a.kanfang_time as kanfangTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.fangwu_order_yesno_types as fangwuOrderYesnoTypes ,a.fangwu_order_yesno_text as fangwuOrderYesnoText ,a.fangwu_order_shenhe_time as fangwuOrderShenheTime ,a.create_time as createTime
